

ADDI   imm[11:0]   rs1    000    rd    0010011
ANDI   imm[11:0]   rs1    111    rd    0010011
ORI    imm[11:0]   rs1    110    rd    0010011


ADD    0000000   rs2    rs1   000  rd  0110011   
SUB    0100000   rs2    rs1   000  rd  0110011   


LUI   imm[31:12]  rd  0110111 {We can't use this}
LW    imm[11:0]  rs1  010  rd  0000011
SW    imm[11:5]  rs2   rs1  010  imm[4:0]  0100011   rs1 has base






addi x10, x0, 100101101001b                         
addi x11, x0, 000000000000b
addi x12, x0, 000000000011b
addi x13, x0, 1000d {store address}

andi x15, x10, 100101101001b    --> x15 contains 100101101001
sw x13, 0(x15)
andi  x15, x10, 000000000011b   --> x15 contains 000000000001b
sw x13, 0(x15)

100101101001 00000 000 01010 0010011
000000000000 00000 000 01011 0010011
000000000011 00000 000 01100 0010011
001111101000 00000 000 01101 0010011
100101101001 01010 111 01111 0010011
0000000 01111 01101 010 00000 0100011

000000000011 01010 111 01111 0010011
0000000 01111 01101 010 00000 0100011
100101101001 00000 000 01010 0010011
100101101001 00000 000 01010 0010011


lui x1,400  --->  00190 0000 1011 0111 --> 00190 0b7
lui x2,04  ---->  00000000000000000100 00010 0110111 --> 00004 137
lui x7,1    --->  00001 0011 1011 0111 --> 000013b7
